channel.title: The BBQ Central Show
channel.description: From big named interviews to advice on cooking brisket and ribs you'll find it all right here inside BBQ Central.

item.title: The Best of the Best
item.description: Interview with Kell Phelps of the National BBQ Festival

item.title: Moonswiners BBQ - Winner of the 2007 Jack Daniels Cook-Off
item.description: Interview with Chad Hayden from Moonswiners. We talk about his win at the Jack this year and much more.

item.title: The Original Charcoal Company
item.description: Interview with Eric Krause, owner of the Original Charcoal Company

item.title: Ray Lampe - Dr. BBQ
item.description: Another interview with Ray Lampe. We talk about his new book and his new gig at the Greenbriar in West Virginia...and more!

item.title: Getting In To The BBQ Catering Business Part 2
item.description: Interview with Dave Hutson from Woodman's Real Pit BBQ.

item.description: Interview with founder and President of the BGE, Ed Fisher.
